name: Death by Snoo-Snoo
author: superforms
notes: Very easy KoG run, went 10-0 from Legend 2 after getting the third Princess. Paladin was nice, and I would be interested in testing a second over one of the Swords Womans. ECon dominated the mirror and comboâ€™d well with Princess and Baby Tiger. Chalice and Rebirth were relatively useless; other tech options may be better.
